resource_dependency.courseCatalogDataSchema: Database schema with fields: course_id (unique ID), title (string), description (text), category (string), level (string), duration (string), prerequisites (text), instructor_id (foreign key), certification_track (string), image_url (string)

function: Display a searchable and filterable course catalog allowing users to browse available courses.
static_description: A grid-based layout showing course cards with thumbnails, titles, categories, levels, and brief descriptions. A search bar at the top with a search icon and filter options panel accessible via a filter icon.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on the search icon focuses the search input field. Clicking on the filter icon toggles visibility of the filter options panel.
As the user types, the course list dynamically filters to show matching results based on title, description, or category.

resource_dependency.courseDetailsDataSchema: Fields: course_id (unique ID), title (string), full_description (text), prerequisites (text), duration (string), syllabus (array of strings), instructor_details (object with name, bio, photo), certification_track (string), related_courses (array of course_ids)

function: Show detailed course information pages with full descriptions, prerequisites, duration, syllabus, and instructor profiles.
static_description: A dedicated page per course featuring a header with course title and image, followed by sections for description, prerequisites, duration, syllabus, and instructor profile with name, photo, and bio.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on 'View Related Courses' scrolls the page to the related courses section.

resource_dependency.enrollmentFormSchema: Fields: enrollment_id (unique ID), user_id (foreign key), course_id (foreign key), enrollment_date (timestamp), status (enum: pending, confirmed, cancelled)
resource_dependency.registrationFormSchema: Fields: user_id (unique ID), email (string), password_hash (string), first_name (string), last_name (string), phone_number (string)

function: Enable online course enrollment through user registration and login processes.
static_description: A multi-step form flow starting with login/registration if not authenticated, then displaying the enrollment confirmation modal after selecting a course.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Enroll Now' redirects unauthenticated users to the login/register page; authenticated users proceed directly to enrollment confirmation.
Submitting the registration form creates a new user entry. Submitting the enrollment form records the enrollment and updates the UI to reflect enrolled status.

resource_dependency.chatbotAPI: Integration with an external chatbot API supporting natural language processing for answering FAQs about courses, enrollment, and certifications.

function: Integrate a chatbot for user assistance and inquiries regarding courses and institute services.
static_description: A floating chat icon positioned at the bottom right corner of every page. When clicked, a chat window slides up from the bottom edge containing conversation history and message input area.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the chat icon opens/closes the chat interface window.
User messages are sent to the chatbot API which returns responses displayed in real-time within the chat window.

resource_dependency.contactFormDataSchema: Fields: contact_id (unique ID), name (string), email (string), subject (string), message (text), submission_date (timestamp)
resource_dependency.contactEmailTemplate: Predefined template used to send submitted contact form data to institute administrators.

function: Include a contact form enabling users to communicate directly with the institute staff.
static_description: A standalone contact form page with labeled input fields for name, email, subject, and message along with a submit button. Instituteâ€™s physical address and phone number are listed alongside the form.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon submission, form data is stored in the database and triggers an automated email notification to the admin team using the predefined template.

resource_dependency.certificationPathwaySchema: Fields: pathway_id (unique ID), title (string), description (text), required_courses (array of course_ids), estimated_completion_time (string)
resource_dependency.progressTrackerSchema: Fields: user_id (foreign key), pathway_id (foreign key), completed_courses (array of course_ids), completion_percentage (integer)

function: Present certification pathway information and allow users to track their progress towards completing these paths.
static_description: Dedicated certification pathway pages displaying titles, descriptions, and lists of required courses. Progress indicators showing percentage complete and completed courses appear beneath each pathway when the user is logged in.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a certification title navigates to its detailed pathway page.
Hovering displays tooltip with exact count of completed vs total required courses.

function: Allow users to browse courses by filtering according to category, difficulty level, or associated certification track.
static_description: Filter sidebar or dropdown menus above the course grid listing categories, levels, and tracks as selectable options. Selected filters highlight visually and update the displayed course set accordingly.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing any filter option immediately updates the course listing to show only relevant matches. Multiple selections can be made across different filter groups.
Clicking 'Clear All' resets all active filters and restores the original course listing.

resource_dependency.userAccountDataSchema: Fields: user_id (unique ID), email (string), first_name (string), last_name (string), enrolled_courses (array of course_ids), certifications_earned (array of cert_ids), profile_picture_url (string)

function: Provide account management features for enrolled students including viewing enrolled courses and earned certifications.
static_description: User dashboard page presenting personal info, enrolled course list with status tags, earned certifications with badges, and links to manage preferences or change password.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a course card navigates to the respective course detail page. Clicking on a certification badge shows verification details.

function: Implement a responsive navigation menu providing consistent access to all major site sections.
static_description: Horizontal navigation bar fixed at the top of desktop views with main links aligned left. Mobile version collapses into a hamburger-style menu icon aligned right.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the menu icon toggles visibility of the mobile-friendly vertical navigation menu overlay.
Navigation remains fixed at the top during scrolling ensuring persistent accessibility.

resource_dependency.colorPaletteGuide: Primary colors: lavender (#E6E6FA) for backgrounds, indigo (#4B0082) for buttons and highlights

function: Apply consistent styling theme throughout the website using lavender background and indigo components.
static_description: All webpages utilize lavender as the base background color and indigo for interactive elements like buttons, headers, and links. Consistent typography and spacing follow this theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Indigo-colored buttons darken slightly on hover to indicate interactivity without altering core palette.

resource_dependency.featuredContentDataSchema: Fields: item_id (unique ID), type (enum: course, certification), target_id (foreign key), headline (string), description (text), image_url (string)

function: Create a homepage showcasing featured courses and certifications to attract visitor interest.
static_description: Homepage layout featuring hero banner, spotlight section highlighting selected courses/certifications with images and summaries, and quick links to explore more.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a featured item navigates to the corresponding course or certification detail page.

resource_dependency.globalSearchEndpoint: API endpoint returning paginated results for courses and certifications matching query terms.

function: Enable global search functionality allowing users to locate specific courses or certifications quickly.
static_description: Search bar prominently placed in header visible across all pages. Displays auto-suggested matches while typing and presents results page upon submission.

interaction_and_states.description: Real-time suggestions appear below the input as the user types, offering likely matches.
Redirects to a dedicated search results page listing matched items grouped by type.

resource_dependency.enrollmentStatusSchema: Fields: user_id (foreign key), course_id (foreign key), status (enum: enrolled, in-progress, completed)
resource_dependency.courseProgressTrackingSchema: Fields: user_id (foreign key), course_id (foreign key), modules_completed (integer), total_modules (integer), last_accessed (timestamp)

function: Display current enrollment status and course progress for logged-in users.
static_description: Within the user dashboard, each enrolled course appears with a status label ('Enrolled', 'In Progress', 'Completed') and a visual progress bar indicating module completion ratio.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a course with 'In Progress' status resumes learning from the last accessed module.

resource_dependency.instituteInfoSchema: Fields: address_line_1 (string), city_state_zip (string), country (string), primary_phone (string), secondary_phone (string), general_email (string), admissions_email (string)

function: Display official contact information and location details of the institute.
static_description: Contact page includes structured office address, multiple phone numbers, emails, and embedded map showing precise location.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on the map marker zooms into the location. Clicking on email addresses opens default mail client pre-filled with recipient.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignBreakpoints: { mobile: max-width 768px, tablet: min-width 769px and max-width 1024px, desktop: min-width 1025px }
resource_dependency.touchOptimizedComponents: UI components adjusted for touch interaction including larger tap targets and swipe gestures where applicable

function: Ensure the entire website is fully functional and aesthetically pleasing on mobile devices.
static_description: Website adapts fluidly to various screen sizes using CSS media queries. Layouts reflow appropriately, fonts scale proportionally, and navigation becomes optimized for touchscreen use.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout adjusts seamlessly between mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints maintaining usability and readability.
On mobile, horizontal swiping between carousel items or tabs enables intuitive navigation.
